name: CatLife - BitLife Cat Game
description:
Simulate life as a cat in this hilarious new text adventure from the makers of BitLife!

How will you live your CatLife?

Do you see yourself as an alley cat scavenging for food or as a faithful companion to an old lady, whiling away your days grooming yourself by the fire?

Start your life as a kitten and see where your unique journey takes you – no two lives are the same!
